Writer: Kevin Eastman (characters), Peter Laird (characters), Bobby Herbeck (story), Todd W. Langen (screenplay), Bobby Herbeck (screenplay)
Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
Actors: Judith Hoag, Elias Koteas, Josh Pais, David Forman
Plot: Four teenage mutant ninja turtles emerge from the shadows to protect New York City from a gang of criminal ninjas.
